comments:
With the 20071030-1133 build of the agent, I got the following NPE while installing:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.p2.touchpoint.natives.NativeTouchpoint$2.execute(NativeTouchpoint.java:63)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.engine.ParameterizedProvisioningAction.execute(ParameterizedProvisioningAction.java:21)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.engine.Phase.mainPerform(Phase.java:147)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.engine.Phase.perform(Phase.java:89)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.engine.Phase.perform(Phase.java:61)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.engine.PhaseSet.perform(PhaseSet.java:39)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.engine.Engine.perform(Engine.java:51)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.ui.operations.ProvisioningUtil.performProvisioningPlan(ProvisioningUtil.java:283)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.ui.operations.ProvisioningUtil.performInstall(ProvisioningUtil.java:265)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.ui.operations.InstallOperation.doExecute(InstallOperation.java:33)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.ui.operations.ProvisioningOperation.execute(ProvisioningOperation.java:41)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.ui.ProvisioningOperationRunner$1.run(ProvisioningOperationRunner.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.p2.ui.ProvisioningOperationRunner$JobRunnableContext$ProvisioningJob.run(ProvisioningOperationRunner.java:46)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

Created an attachment (id=81763)
patch

Here is a patch which checks for null in the native and eclipse touchpoints and then returns an error status if the parameters are missing. 

Simon, please review. In most cases I assumed that a missing parameter was a bad thing and an error but this might not be the case.
Simon has a modified version of DJ's patch that will be committed shortly.
